subject: Re: [junit] DataSource-Webshpere (Junit Problem)
msgSnippet: ... Your previous message was perfectly clear. Maybe you do not understand how these forums work. People read the messages when they feel like it and respond
messageBody:
safamack wrote:

> Hello Everyone:
> Since I have received no reply, I assume my previous posting was not
> clear. I try to be clearer with my problem.

Your previous message was perfectly clear.

Maybe you do not understand how these forums work. People read the
messages when they feel like it and respond when they feel like it. If
you want a level of service that includes immediate responses to your
questions, you will have to start paying for that. My rates are
reasonable. :)

I hope my answer (in the other message) helps.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
